seo.title: About | SustainSage
seo.description: Learn about SustainSage’s philosophy, founders, and safeguards. We offer bilingual, ICF-aligned coaching rooted in cultural humility and informed consent.

hero.title: Coaching with cultural humility
hero.subtitle: We created SustainSage so UK-based clients with Chinese heritage can access calm, ICF-aligned coaching that honours identity, language, and consent.

philosophy.title: Our philosophy
philosophy.intro: We blend coaching, facilitation, and design thinking so each partnership stays client-led and culturally aware.

principles.title: You lead the agenda
principles.description: We listen for what matters, reflect it back, and co-design experiments only when you are ready.

principles.title: Language is a tool, not a barrier
principles.description: Sessions can flow in English, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, or a mix—whatever helps you think clearly.

principles.title: Experiments build confidence
principles.description: Small, low-risk tests help you gather evidence for your decisions without promises or pressure.

founders.title: Meet the founders
founders.intro: We met through diaspora community projects and built SustainSage to bridge structured coaching with grounded cultural understanding.

people.name: Hao-Cheng Tsai
people.bio: Holds space for systems thinking, stakeholder mapping, and experimentation so your ideas can land responsibly.
people.credentials: ICF ACC candidate, MFA Service Experience Design, former social innovation facilitator.

people.name: Yi-Ling Lai
people.bio: Specialises in reflective dialogue, intercultural transitions, and gentle accountability for sustained change.
people.credentials: ICF ACC, MSc Applied Positive Psychology, community learning designer across the UK and Taiwan.

safeguards.title: Safeguards & boundaries
items: Confidentiality is maintained except where law or safeguarding obligations require disclosure.
We clarify scope, fees, data handling, and cancellation policies before coaching begins.
When therapy, legal, immigration, medical, or financial advice is needed, we pause coaching and refer or signpost other services with your consent.

cta.title: Curious about partnering with us?
cta.body: Let’s explore how SustainSage can support you, your community, or your organisation in a way that feels respectful and sustainable.
